properties.name: kio.store.folder
properties.description: File system's path to the folder that will be used as the root store

properties.name: kio.oauth.client.id
properties.description: Id of the InMemory OAuth client

properties.name: kio.oauth.client.secret
properties.description: Secret of the InMemory OAuth client

properties.name: kio.oauth.client.access-token-validity-time
properties.description: Time expressed in seconds that represent how much an access token will be active

properties.name: kio.oauth.client.refresh-token-validity-time
properties.description: Time expressed in seconds that represent how much an access token will be active
